channel.title: Is there someone on this site that can accually help me make a server?!?!?!?!?!?
channel.description: i realy need help making a server or if someone can make me a server then get on it at same time as meh and make meh owner then i banip you then make you a co-owner with meh then please reply if you cant help meh then dont reply at all please cuz i know there are alot of you that are mean and take it out on other people but please dont take it out on meh im already having a hard enough time. But if you can help meh then please reply. OHH YEAH.. theres something els if some one helps me make server or if you make server for meh.. im making new stuff that isnt even on runescape or client.silabsoft or moparscape its going to be awsome oh and first 5 people to join gets admin and 3 more after the 5 gets mod then the rest of you get member =) and for thoughs members i will give mod/admin later on just dont ask alot.. and i have had expiereince on my own server cuz my best friend that moved away gave me his but it had gotten hacked and there is no way of getting it back unless i hack it back.. so dont wory i know what to do once i have my own server :D thanks and please reply if you can help and remember please dont take your anger out on meh iv had enough trouble for the month lawlz.. :) :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2008, 06:14:05 pm[/size][hr]umm.. oops i ment demote then make you co-owner =) lol soz for that
